name: Extreme Dimension Tag Blanc + Neptune VS Zombie Army
name_original: Extreme Dimension Tag Blanc + Neptune VS Zombie Army
description:
Extreme Dimension Tag Blanc + Neptune VS Zombie Army is an action game developed by Compile Heart. It came out on 15-10-2015. Compile Heart published the game.
Extreme Dimension Tag Blanc + Neptune VS Zombie Army is available on PS Vita.
